title: Man in the Making
creator_credit: Brenda Horsfield, James McCloy and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Dr. J.M. Tanner, Reader in Growth and development in children at London University introduces this scientific study of the growth of the mind and body.”Man in the making” series probes the development of the child during the first few years of life.
creator_credit_for_label: Brenda Horsfield, James McCloy and British Broadcasting Corporation
